title: 완곡 표현 - 비판적 완곡법
description: 비판이나 부정적 의견을 완곡하게 전달하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: It's not bad, but I think there's room for a bit more improvement.
Overall it's fine, but there are a few disappointing aspects.
It was a good attempt, but it's a bit different from what I expected.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 비판적 완곡법 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 나쁘지는 않지만, 조금 더 개선할 여지가 있을 것 같아요.
sentences.en: It's not bad, but I think there's room for a bit more improvement.

sentences.kr: 전체적으로는 괜찮은데, 몇 가지 아쉬운 점이 있네요.
sentences.en: Overall it's fine, but there are a few disappointing aspects.

sentences.kr: 좋은 시도였지만, 기대했던 것과는 조금 다르네요.
sentences.en: It was a good attempt, but it's a bit different from what I expected.

sentences.kr: 방향은 맞는 것 같은데, 접근 방식을 조금 바꿔보면 어떨까요?
sentences.en: The direction seems right, but how about changing the approach a bit?

sentences.kr: 아이디어는 좋은데, 실행에서 좀 아쉬운 부분이 있어요.
sentences.en: The idea is good, but there are some disappointing parts in the execution.

sentences.kr: 일단 이 정도로도 괜찮지만, 더 나아질 수 있을 것 같아요.
sentences.en: This level is okay for now, but I think it could get better.

sentences.kr: 충분히 노력하신 건 알겠지만, 결과가 기대에 못 미치네요.
sentences.en: I can see you put in enough effort, but the results fall short of expectations.

sentences.kr: 취지는 이해하지만, 방법론에서 재고가 필요할 것 같아요.
sentences.en: I understand the intention, but the methodology might need reconsideration.
